caption.title: Estimates of the infectious period using the SIR-PF with space reprobing.
caption.p: Simulations were performed for (A) H1N1, including seasonal and pandemic H1N1, (B) H3N2, (C) influenza B, and (D) all strains. One hundred simulations were run for each time series; mean estimates are shown by the blue lines; 95% confidence intervals are shown by the grey dashed lines.
Click here for additional data file.
